name: Insect Raid
description:
Do you hate insects? Do you want to shoot them instead of stepping on them? Hate robots? Then this game is the best fit for you!

Play Insect Raid! A shooter game about getting rid of the robotic insects coming at you with a number mechanic twist!

Control:
Left click if your number is higher than the insect
Right click if your number is lower than the insect
